titles.title: City, O City, Of Our God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
City, O city of our God,
All my springs of joy are in you.
City, O city, of our God,
All my springs of joy are in you.
All my springs of joy are in you.
City, O city, of our God,
All my springs of joy are in you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
This one and that one was born in her,
All my springs of joy are in you.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Singers and dancers together say
All my springs of joy are in you.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
City, O city of our God,
Glorious things are spoken of you.
City, O city, of our God,
Glorious things are spoken of you.
Glorious things are spoken of you.
City, O city, of our God,
Glorious things are spoken of you.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
/Ciudad, Ciudad de nuestro Dios,
todas mi fuentes de gozo est치n en ti./ (2)
todas mis fuentes de gozo est치n en ti.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
/Este y aquella fueron nacidos en ella
todas mis fuentes de gozo est치n en ti./ (2)
todas mis fuentes de gozo est치n en ti.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
/Cantantes, danzantes todos dicen
cosas gloriosas se hablan de ti/ (2)
cosas gloriosas se hablan de ti.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Ciudad, ciudad de nuestro Dios
Cosas gloriosas se hablan de ti.
